pronunciation.pinyin: rén wú yuǎn lǜ , bì yǒu jìn yōu
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: ren2 wu2 yuan3 lu:4 , bi4 you3 jin4 you1

meanings.value: He who gives no thought to far-flung problems soon finds suffering nearby (idiom, from Analects).
Smug concentration on the here and now will lead to future sorrow.
